attributes.action: Stop the redevelopment of Parr Street Studios
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to block planning permission on this site and preserve a piece of Liverpool music history. You wouldn't get rid of the Cavern and Parr street is equally as important to the cities musical heritage.
attributes.background: Stop the planned demolition of Parr Street Studios and associated venues in Liverpool for development of high end apartments. The studio is a part of the cities rich musical heritage and must be stopped. Iconic albums have been recorded at the studio and it should be preserved.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Liverpool Council.

You can find out how to petition the council here:

http://councillors.liverpool.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
